document_data.name: Quillan
document_data.mainbody: '''Quillan''' was the sage of [[Bloodstone Village]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Quillan was focused on local flora, always trying to respond to questions with something related to flowers or plants. Despite looking a bit senile, he was very intelligent and hardy. He was a good historian.
document_data.History:
Quillan originally was a druid.

Quillan saw the lives and death of two barons of the [[Barony of Bloodstone]]. He teach [[Christine Dragonsbane]] the ways of the druids.

In [[1359 DR]], he worked as an advisor to King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]] but still prided himself with teaching Christine.
